title: pAdam paNindEnE
sahitya:
pAdam paNindiDuvOm paradEviyE tAyE 


anupallavi

  Adi antamillA nAda brahmamE tuNai sheidiruL vinai tIrttaruL sundara vaDivE tAyE


caraNam    Atma saktar jIvan muktar aruTpaNi puriya amara vAzhvu perugi ulagil Anandam parava
satva rUpiyE tAyE shakti dEviyE sharaNam idu taruNam tiruk-karuNai sheiguvAi ammA
